name: prs-atm
description: A CLI tool for financing on PRESS.one.

scripts.readme:
cat template.md > README.md && echo '
```' >> README.md && ./bin/prs-atm.js >> README.md && echo '```' >> README.md
scripts.docker-build-hub: docker build --no-cache . -t pressone/prs-atm && docker push pressone/prs-atm
scripts.docker-build-cn: docker build --no-cache . -t dockerhub.qingcloud.com/pressone/prs-atm && docker push dockerhub.qingcloud.com/pressone/prs-atm
scripts.docker-build: npm run docker-build-hub && npm run docker-build-cn
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm version patch && npm update && npm run readme && ( git commit -am 'npm update' || true ) && git pull && git push

author: Leask Wong <i@leaskh.com>
